duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead multidisciplined teams in support of Procurement Coordination, Contract Management, and Framework Management.
Optimize quality, timing, and cost of materials and services needed by Networks, including vendor negotiation, regulatory compliance, and promoting best practices.
Support management/mitigation of change order requests and material expediting to meet project milestones.
Provide leadership that promotes a culture of collaboration, efficiency, innovation, and quality across business areas.
Communicate and influence all levels of management, prioritize objectives, and mediate cross-functional issues.
Design and provide wide-scale training to internal customers.
Articulate the business needs relative to the procurement of materials and services for the entire portfolio of capital projects across AVANGRID.
Facilitate collaborative decision-making to minimize contractual and commercial risk while optimizing savings and efficiencies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree. Master’s degree a plus. PMP Certification preferred.
